5G mining truck 
2019-10-24
China has developed a 5G intelligent unmanned mining truck, according to Science and Technology Daily yesterday. The unmanned mining truck is used for opencast mining. It measures 10.2 meters long, 5.4 meters wide and five meters tall, and has a carrying capacity of 110 tons. The truck can plan its mission and route for itself, load and unload automatically, and drive by itself.
